pic1_alt: Mr. Trash Wheel logo. Paddle wheel connected to a silver dome, that has a conveyor belt going up to it. The silver dome has large googly eyes and a red cape, personifying the Trash Wheel into a cute and friendly hero.
pic2_alt: Infographic of how much trash the Trash Wheel family has collected. The Trash Wheel Family has collected 2,362.23 Tons of Trash. 938,626 plastic bags. 13,036,008 cigarette butts. 1,812,576 plastic bottles. 1,383,053 foam containers. 7,076 sports balls. A keg. A guitar. A snake.
